title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may not lack for words today, whether spoken or written. But there is a distinct possibility that you could overshare. You tend to be more talkative and sociable now that the Moon is conspiring in your sign with vivacious Venus and verbose Mercury. However, you might need to resist the urge to divulge secrets that are not yours to share. Stay alert about wading into topics that generally make you or others uncomfortable. Focus on keeping things pleasant and they will likely stay that way. Save the cold hard truth for when people can handle it. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
